data.author: Saksham Hadokar
data.blogText: The Story begins where it all started 12 years ago, Cristiano Ronaldo reached an agreement with Manchester United 12 years after he left Old Trafford for Real Madrid. Where it all started from the rumors-Cristiano to City, eventually the rival United came in front and got their former superstar for €15 million ($17.7 million) transfer fee, with  €8 million ($9.4 million) in additional add-ons. From Manchester United: Manchester United is delighted to confirm that the club has reached agreement with Juventus for the transfer of Cristiano Ronaldo, subject to agreement of personal terms, visa and medical.Cristiano, a five-time Ballon d'Or winner, has so far won over 30 major trophies during his career, including five UEFA Champions League titles, four FIFA Club World Cups, seven league titles in England, Spain and Italy, and the European Championship for his native Portugal.In his first spell for Manchester United, he scored 118 goals in 292 games.Everyone at the club looks forward to welcoming Cristiano back to Manchester CRISTIANO AND UNITED Alex Ferguson signed the first Portuguese for 12.24 million pounds ($16.85 million) in August 2003.In 2006-07, United won the title and Ronaldo was the player of the season. In the 2007-08 season United won the champions League,cristiano finishing as Europe's top goalscorer with 42 goals and top scorer of the league. Caps 2008 season by winning the Ballon d'Or. In 2008-09, helps United to the Premier League title and League Cup. Despite his age, Ronaldo has kept himself physically fit and mighty, where he is coming off the back of a season in which he scored 36 goals in 44 matches  for Juventus. Well,The stage is set for him once again and finish the stage where it all started. HE'S COMING HOME.
